title: Such recreational open space shall not be entirely proposed in marginal distances / set back or major part of it shall not be proposed in marginal distances / set back
clause_text: Such recreational open space shall not be entirely proposed in marginal distances / set back or major part of it shall not be proposed in marginal distances / set back. However, such recreational open space, bigger than marginal distances and confirming to the Regulation No.3.4.6, may include part of marginal distances / set back area, if such recreational open space is proposed adjoining to plot boundary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
